articles.title: Johnson dumped in shock twist to saga
articles.description: The fallout from Mitchell Johnson’s scathing column has continued after he was left off a major radio station’s list of commentators for the upcoming summer of cricket.
articles.content:

articles.title: ECB introduces independent cricket regulator
articles.description: The England and Wales Cricket Board (ECB) has introduced an independent regulator in response to damning independent report into the game.
articles.content:
The Independent Commission for Equity in Cricket received more than 4,000 responses to its call for evidence
